name: Cannot update the Week start day with Start_date in the project with wrong values -- @1.2

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "'start_date' must be a date value represented as iso 8601 date"

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: 'start_date' must be a date value represented as iso 8601 date

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
